about.title: About
about.intro: SoundBlueMusic Tools is a collection of free, browser-based utilities for musicians, creators, and everyday use.
about.missionText: We believe powerful tools should be accessible to everyone. No installation, no signup, no tracking. Just open and use.
about.toolsIntro: Each tool is designed with simplicity and performance in mind.
about.metronomeDesc: A precision metronome with customizable tempo, time signatures, and visual feedback. Perfect for practice sessions.
about.drumMachineDesc: Create beats with an intuitive step sequencer. Multiple sound kits and pattern storage.
about.qrGeneratorDesc: Generate QR codes instantly. Customize colors and download in high resolution.
about.translatorDesc: Korean-English translator with natural language processing. Understands context and nuance.
about.logoStory: The SoundBlueMusic logo represents the harmony between sound and technology.
about.logoColorDesc: Our signature blue represents clarity, trust, and the infinite depth of sound. It's the color of the sky and the ocean—vast spaces where sound travels freely.
about.logoDesignDesc: Clean, minimal, and modern. The design reflects our commitment to simplicity—tools that work without getting in your way.
about.openSourceText: Built with modern web technologies. Contributions welcome on GitHub.

benchmark.title: Benchmark
benchmark.description: Translator quality test and performance evaluation results.
benchmark.note: Translation quality evaluation based on Test Suite v3.0
